sentences.en: Continued interchange of genes will counteract the effects of selection.
sentences.cn: 连续的基因交换将抵消选择的效果.

sentences.en: For a good bond, an adhesive must counteract the effect of surface roughness and boundary layers.
sentences.cn: 为了取得很好的粘结, 粘结剂必须能克服表面粗糙和边界层的反应.

sentences.en: He now bore off to the right to counteract the possible deviation from his true course.
sentences.cn: 因此,他为了校正,就朝右面走,以便走上正确的路程.

sentences.en: He ordered all the port cannon to be heaved to starboard to counteract the list.
sentences.cn: 他命令把左弦上所有的大炮移到右舷以抵消船的倾斜.

sentences.en: Here Jephson thought of Mason - let him counteract that if he can.
sentences.cn: 杰甫逊这么说的时候,心里想到的是梅森,看他能不能反驳.

sentences.en: Our bodies produce antibodies to counteract disease.
sentences.cn: 我们的身体能产生抗体以抵抗疾病.

sentences.en: The doctor gave him some medicine to counteract the effect of the poison.
The mountaintop was not powerful enough to counteract the drugs, the fears.
sentences.cn: 这山顶的环境不足以抵抗药物, 不足以抵抗恐惧.

sentences.en: The power of red wine to counteract high cholesterol has been ballyhooed in the press.
sentences.cn: 红酒降低胆固醇的功效被媒体夸大了。

sentences.en: These exercises aim to counteract the effects of stress and tension.
sentences.cn: 这些训练旨在抵消压力与紧张的影响。

sentences.en: They gave him drugs to counteract his withdrawal symptoms.
sentences.cn: 他们给他服药以消除他的脱瘾症状。

sentences.en: This drug should counteract the poison.
This drug will counteract the effects of poison.
This event will counteract such trends.
sentences.cn: 这一事件将会削弱此类趋势。

sentences.en: This medicine will counteract the queasiness caused by the antibiotics.
sentences.cn: 这种药会抑制抗生素引起的反胃.

sentences.en: To set a thief to catch a thief, that is what we call " to counteract one toxin with another ".
sentences.cn: 叫小偷去抓小偷, 这就叫 “ 以毒攻毒 ”.

words.tran_cn: 反作用的；抵抗的；反对的
中和；反对的行动；抵抗；反动

trans.tran_en: to reduce or prevent the bad effect of something, by doing something that has the opposite effect
to reduce or prevent the bad effect of something, by doing something that has the opposite effect
